title: On the Beat
overview: Going behind the front desks, inside the patrol cars and on the beat with the frontline Gardaí across Dundalk, Longford and Waterford, while witnessing the challenges and issues being faced by the Gardaí policing in urban and rural Ireland. The series follows a number of different police officers, ranging in age and rank, as they carry out their daily duties, from Garda Neechal Ramah to Inspector Dave Jordan.
